Text: 60fps is how they are handed off of HDTV by the provider.  I generally try to encode them at 24, but normally they come out with framerate errors.  Several movies I have posted here ae at 24fps and will be if they will encode as such.  To me it makes no difference but I thought it better to have a 60fps copy than no copy at all.  I'll try to include subs when I can get them.
